Cryptography is like having a secret code with your best friend. You write messages that look like gibberish to everyone else, but your friend knows the secret decoder ring to read them. It keeps your secrets safe even if someone steals your note!

In this lesson, we'll learn about cryptography basics for cybersecurity in a way that makes sense. We'll start simple, use real examples, and build your understanding step by step. By the end, you'll understand the core ideas and why they matter!
